name: Urn of Shadows
ability:
Order: Trigger an allied unit's Deathwish ability.
If you targeted a bronze unit repeat the Order once.

name: Auberon: Conqueror
ability:
Veil.
Deploy: Play a bronze Wild Hunt unit from your starting deck.
Whenever you play a Wild Hunt unit, boost it by 1.

name: Tir ná Lia
ability:
Resilience.
Deploy: Boost an allied unit by the number of unique bronze Wild Hunt cards in your starting deck.
Order: Spawn and play Red Riders.
Devotion: Also Spawn Frost equal to the amounts lost during the last round transition.

name: Eredin Bréacc Glas
ability:
Deploy: Spawn Frost on an enemy row for 2 turns.
Dominance: Increase the damage dealt by Frost by 1

name: Caranthir Ar-Feiniel
ability:
Deploy: Spawn Frost on both enemy rows for 2 turns.
Dominance: Frost duration does not decrease.
Devotion: For each additional Frost you spawn above the limit, trigger it instantly.

name: Caranthir: Golden Child
ability: At the start of your turn, while in hand or deck, reset own power and boost self by the damage dealt by Frost in the last 5 enemy turns.

name: Ard Gaeth
ability:
Echo.
Spawn Frost on both enemy rows for 3 turns.

name: Ge'els
ability:
Deploy: Play a Wild Hunt special from your deck.
Devotion: Play a Wild Hunt card from your deck instead.

name: Imlerith Sabbath
ability:
Deploy: Set an allied unit's power to 7.
Dominance: Set a unit's power to 7 instead.

name: Imlerith's Wrath
ability: Damage an enemy unit by the power of your highest-power unit. If it was on a row with Frost, destroy it instead.

name: Winter Queen
ability:
At the end of your turn, if there is Frost on both enemy rows, Summon self to Ranged row.
Devotion: Once both players have passed, boost self by 2 for each turn of Frost remaining on your opponent's side.

name: The Naglfar
ability: Look at 2 random gold cards from your deck, then play one and move the other back to the top of it.

name: Aen Elle Aristocrat
ability:
Order (Dominance): Move an enemy unit to the other row.
At the end of your turn, Spawn Frost for 1 turn on each enemy row on which Frost was applied this turn.

name: Naglfar's Crew
ability:
Deploy: Spawn Frost on an enemy row for 2 turns.
At the end of your turn, if there is Frost on the opposite row, boost self by 1.

name: Red Riders
ability:
Choose one:
Spawn Frost on an enemy row for 4 turns.
Spawn Frost on an enemy row for 2 turns, then replay a bronze Wild Hunt unit.
Spawn Frost on both enemy rows for 2 turns.

name: Wild Hunt Bruiser
ability: Deploy: Move an enemy unit to the other row. If the target moves to a row affected by Frost, damage it by 2.

name: Aen Elle Conqueror
ability:
Veil.
Deploy: Destroy self.
Devotion: Cancel the Deploy ability.

name: Naglfar's Taskmaster
ability:
Deploy: Reset the power of an enemy unit.
Dominance: Also Purify it.

name: Wild Hunt Navigator
ability:
Deploy: Boost an allied unit by the duration of Frost on its opposite row.
Dominance: Boost by the total duration of Frost on your opponent's side instead.

name: Wild Hunt Rider
ability: Deploy (Dominance): Summon all copies of self from your deck to this row.

name: Wild Hunt Warrior
ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Dominance: Also Spawn Frost on its row for 1 turn.

name: Viy
ability: Deathwish: Shuffle Viy back into your deck, then increase its base power by 3.

name: Brewess: Ritual
ability: Deathwish: Summon 2 random bronze Deathwish units from your deck to this row.

name: Arachas Queen
ability:
Deploy: Consume an allied bronze unit.
Order: Spawn and play Arachas Nest.
Deathwish: Summon the Consumed unit from your graveyard to this row.

name: Dettlaff: Higher Vampire
ability: Deathwish: Summon self from your graveyard to the same row. This ability is limited to 2 uses and does not refresh when leaving the battlefield.

name: Weavess: Incantation
ability: Deploy (Melee): Draw a card, then Discard a card. If the Discarded card was a unit, boost self by its power.

name: Miruna
ability: Deathwish: Seize a chosen unit with 4 or less power.

name: Ruehin
ability: Deathwish: Summon self from your graveyard to your Melee row and Consume your lowest-power unit, excluding self.

name: Whispering Hillock
ability: Play a Deathwish unit from your deck.

name: Giant Toad
ability:
Deploy: Consume an allied unit.
When you play a Deathwish unit on your Ranged row, Summon self from your graveyard to the same row, Consume it and gain Doomed.

name: Siren
ability:
Order: Consume an allied unit.
Deathwish: Boost adjacent allied units by 2.

name: Archespore
ability: Deathwish: Summon all copies of self from your deck to this row.

name: Bridge Troll
ability: Deathwish: Boost the lowest-power allied unit by 4.

name: Desert Banshee
ability:
Order: Consume an allied unit.
Whenever you play a unit with the Deathwish ability, boost self by 1.

name: Endrega Eggs
ability: Deathwish: Spawn 3 Drones on this row.

name: Foglet
ability: Deathwish: Spawn Fog on the opposite row for 3 turns.

name: Adda: Striga
ability: Zeal. Order (Predator): Consume a Token. If it was allied, double the boost from it.

ability:
Zeal.
Order: Consume an ally.
Charge: 3.

name: Toad Prince
ability: Deploy (Melee): Consume a unit with 4 or less power.

ability:
Order: Consume an allied unit.
Charges: 2

ability:
Deploy: Consume an allied unit.

ability:

name: Slyzard

Order: Consume an allied unit on this row.

ability:
Thrive.
Whenever this unit's Thrive is triggered, boost all allied Insectoids on this row by 1.
Whenever you play an Organic card, trigger own Thrive.

name: Glustyworp
ability: Deploy: Destroy all units with 1 power. For each unit destroyed, boost self by 2

ability: Deploy: Spawn 2 Drones and boost all allied Insectoids on this row by 1.

Thrive.
